channel.title: Need help with this little error
channel.description: If you kill monsters after abit client will freeze and will throw this error. Any ideas? [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2nuljxk.png[/img]

item.title: Need help with this little error
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

I had that same problem with another source. Mine appeared when I tried logging in. I was told to look in playerupdating.java or playerupdate.java and look for something like “out.writeByte(player.getHeadIcon())”

I think there should be three:

out.writeByte(player.getHeadIcon()); out.writeByte(player.getSkullIcon()); out.writeByte(player.getHintIcon());

(naming might be different)
and just comment out the hintIcon one, or if that isn’t there, comment out one of them

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with this little error
